 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמַךְ‎</span><sub>48</sub> **verb** ==lean, lay, rest, support== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician in proper name [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>317, 329</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְמַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; also Ethiopic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cause to lean upon***, etc. [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>335</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be high, ascend, raise, uplift***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***roof***; — 

**Qal**<sub>41</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Deut.34.9|Deut 34:9]]; [[Ezek.24.2|Ezek 24:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָמַךְ‎</span> consecutive [[Amos.5.19|Amos 5:19]] +; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָֽמְכָה‎</span> [[Ps.88.8|Ps 88:8]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָכָ֑תְהוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.59.16|Isa 59:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמָכָ֑תְנִי‎</span> [[Isa.63.5|Isa 63:5]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְמֹךְ‎</span> [[Lev.8.14|Lev 8:14]]; [[Num.27.23|Num 27:23]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְמְכֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Ps.3.6|Ps 3:6]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמְכֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.116|Ps 119:116]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוֺמֵךְ‎</span> [[Isa.63.5|Isa 63:5]] + 3 t.; plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹמְכֵי‎</span> [[Ezek.30.6|Ezek 30:6]]; [[Ps.54.6|Ps 54:6]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמוּךְ‎</span> [[Isa.26.3|Isa 26:3]]; [[Ps.112.8|Ps 112:8]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְמוּכִים‎</span> [[Ps.111.8|Ps 111:8]] — 

**1. a.** ***lean*** or ***lay*** hand upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span>): [[Amos.5.19|Amos 5:19]] elsewhere in sacred rite: on head of sacrifice victim, as those who share in sacrifice, [[Exod.29.10|Exod 29:10]]; [[Exod.29.15|Exod 29:15]]; [[Exod.29.19|Exod 29:19]]; [[Lev.1.4|Lev 1:4]] + 12 t. Leviticus; [[Num.8.12|Num 8:12]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.29.23|2Chr 29:23]] so of Levites, presented to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.8.10|Num 8:10]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); on head of blasphemer [[Lev.24.14|Lev 24:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; as witnesses of his guilt); on head of Joshua in consecration (Moses subject) [[Num.27.18|Num 27:18]]; [[Num.27.23|Num 27:23]]; [[Deut.34.9|Deut 34:9]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** intransitive [[Ps.88.8|Ps 88:8]] thy wrath ***hath rested*** upon me (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַי‎</span>); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמַךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלֶךְבָּֿבֶל אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.24.2|Ezek 24:2]] ***hath leaned against, rested his weight upon***, Jerusalem, i.e. invested (Toy), begun the siege of it. 

**2.** ***support, uphold, sustain***, only figurative: with 2 accusative [[Gen.27.37|Gen 27:37]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) with corn and must ***have I sustained him***, provided sustenance for him, compare (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Ps.51.14|Ps 51:14]] ***uphold*** Egypt [[Ezek.30.6|Ezek 30:6]] absolute [[Isa.63.5|Isa 63:5]] especially of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***upholding, sustaining*** [[Isa.59.16|Isa 59:16]]; [[Isa.63.5|Isa 63:5]]; [[Ps.3.6|Ps 3:6]]; [[Ps.37.17|Ps 37:17]]; [[Ps.37.24|Ps 37:24]]; [[Ps.54.6|Ps 54:6]] (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***essentiae*** see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:119i»§ 119i</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> above **7 a**), [[Ps.119.116|Ps 119:116]]; [[Ps.145.14|Ps 145:14]] so passive participle [[Ps.111.8|Ps 111:8]] ***they are sustained***, i.e. maintained (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s commands), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָמוּךְ לִבּוֺ‎</span>) [[Ps.112.8|Ps 112:8]] ***his heart is sustained***, firm, and so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵצֶר ס‎</span> [[Isa.26.3|Isa 26:3]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְמַ֫כְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.71.6|Ps 71:6]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְמָ֑כוּ‎</span> [[Isa.48.2|Isa 48:2]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּמֵךְ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.21|2Kgs 18:21]]; [[Isa.36.6|Isa 36:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּמֵךְ‎</span> [[Judg.16.29|Judg 16:29]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסָּֽמְכוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.32.8|2Chr 32:8]] — reflexive ***support***, or ***brace oneself***, also with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span><sup>[[Judg.16.29|Judg 16:29]]</sup> ***and he braced himself*** against (upon) them (the pillars); [[2Kgs.18.21|2Kgs 18:21]] (if) a man ***support himself*** on it (Egypt as a cracked reed) = [[Isa.36.6|Isa 36:6]] on cheering words [[2Chr.32.8|2Chr 32:8]] on God [[Isa.48.2|Isa 48:2]]; [[Ps.71.6|Ps 71:6]]. **Pi\`el** ***Imperative*** masculine plural suffix + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> instr,: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַמְּכוּנִי‎</span> [[Song.2.5|Song 2:5]] ***sustain*** (refresh, revive) ***me with raisin-cakes***.
